00006 /* This function returns the dot product of two vectors. */
00007 /*********************** get_dotprod() *******************/
00008 double get_dotprod(vectormag_3D a,vectormag_3D b){
00009 double dp=0;
00010 dp=(a.i*b.i+a.j*b.j+a.k*b.k); 
00011 return dp; 
00012 }
